          <title>
            <string language="en">Bitumens in runways</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bitumen in den Laufbahnen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bitumes dans les pistes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Betumes nas pistas de decolagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bitumi in piste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίσσες στους διαδρόμους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Betunes en cauces</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the concrete gaps are filled with squashy bitumen to prevent cracking of concrete sections of a runway on a hot day.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aeroplane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bitumens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Concrete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cracking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">runway</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die konkreten 
Abstände mit squashy Bitumen gefüllt werden, um das Knacken der 
konkreten Kapitel einer Laufbahn an einem heißen Tag zu verhindern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les lacunes 
concrètes sont remplies de bitume mou et humide pour empêcher fendre 
des sections concrètes d'une piste un jour chaud.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as aberturas 
concretas estão enchidas com o betume squashy para impedir rachar de 
seções concretas de uma pista de decolagem em um dia quente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le lacune 
concrete sono colmate di bitume squashy per impedire spezzarsi delle 
sezioni concrete di una pista un giorno caldo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα συγκεκριμένα κενά 
καλύπτονται με την πολτοποιημένη πίσσα για να αποτρέψουν το 
ράγισμα των συγκεκριμένων τμημάτων ενός διαδρόμου μια καυτή 
ημέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los boquetes 
concretos están llenados de betún squashy para prevenir quebrarse de
secciones concretas de un cauce en un día caliente.</string>
          </description>
